Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.action

Class CollectiveAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.action.Action
      • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.action.CollectiveAction

extends Action
    An Action which applies a collection of contained, delegate actions.
